summary: Implemented centralized industry theme mapping and applied primary/background styling to ContentPage with CSS-variable driven link/section styling. Added BrandLogo component with onError text fallback and wired it into header/footer. However, accent_color is not actually used in styling, and the required placeholder logo asset under frontend/public is not shown in the diff. Also, global theme tokens in index.css were modified beyond industry-only theming needs.
